[vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” bg_image=”1336″ bg_position=”left top” bg_repeat=”no-repeat” bg_color=”#ff0059″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”light” text_align=”left” top_padding=”1%” bottom_padding=”14%” enable_gradient=”true” color_overlay=”rgba(52,0,211,0.94)” color_overlay_2=”rgba(119,0,0,0.71)” gradient_direction=”left_t_to_right_b” overlay_strength=”0.95″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” shape_divider_height=”350″ bg_image_animation=”none” parallax_bg=”true” parallax_bg_speed=”fast” shape_type=”waves_opacity_alt”][vc_column centered_text=”true” column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” top_margin=”13%” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][split_line_heading]

Our passion grows

with each one of you

[/split_line_heading]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” bg_color=”#ffffff” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”2%” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”padding-1-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color=”#ffffff” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_color_hover=”#ffffff” background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”2/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]
Competition Details
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]You need to find your way into the first flag, after that you will be directly guided to the next flag and so on. Keep in mind that once you are in … you must follow the exactly directions to achieve the final goal!

Each flag has specific tasks or can also be creative ways to gain access for that flag.

All the flags are created by HTZ staff, in case something is not clear about how this challenge will run, please review game rules. If you do not follow the rules, you will be automatically disqualified because its not fair to others participants and our community![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” top_margin=”7%” width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” bg_color=”#ffffff” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”1%” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”padding-1-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color=”#ffffff” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_color_hover=”#ffffff” background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][fancy_box box_style=”color_box_hover” icon_family=”none” image_url=”1328″ color=”Extra-Color-3″ box_alignment=”center” min_height=”450″]

Event Ticket

Price

  • Participate to challenges
  • Attend to main event
  • Community experience
  • Learn new ways of ethical hacking
  • Get in contact with new technology
  • Job Opportunity
  • Networking
  • Coffee Break

 

[/fancy_box][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][fancy_box box_style=”color_box_hover” icon_family=”none” image_url=”760″ color=”Extra-Color-3″ box_alignment=”center” min_height=”450″]

Programming

Social Engineering

Scripting

Recon

Vulnerabilities

Cryptography

Our event can have different objectives or available time, depends on our creativity and how far we can push you into this challenge[/fancy_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”]

[vc_column_text]

All challenges will be presented in detail by our staff. If you are interested into presenting your work/research, email us at contact[@]hackthezone.com

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
